conbody.p: After activation, the licenses are bound to your user account until their expiry dates, or until they are reassigned to another user account. You can still remove the licenses or transfer them manually.
To transfer a KSE per-User license, you need to:

ol.li: Remove a license. See Remove a License.
Add the new user in the Licensed Users section. See: Grant Katalon Licenses.

conbody.p: For KRE, one session will reserve one license. You must deactivate the machine ID that reserved that license first. Another user can then use KRE and take over the license.

For example, if the KRE license is bound to your machine ID because you have run KSE using KRE. You must deactivate your machine ID so that the other member in your organization can use the KRE license.
